Le FPT, est un fonds collecté dans le bu: The FPT is a fund collected with the aim of promoting the tourism sector in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
Le Fonds de Promotiont du Tourisme est a: The Tourism Promotion Fund is funded by a royalty on the value of transactions carried out by operators in the sector. (Article 2 of decree 0013/CAB/MIN/TOURISME/FMMA/2018 of August 17, 2018).
